sentences.sContent: Wendy came up and sat beside me.
sentences.sCn: 温迪走过来，坐在我身边。

sentences.sContent: I was standing right beside her at the time.
sentences.sCn: 当时我就站在她的旁边。

sentences.sContent: This year’s sales figures don’t look very good beside last year’s results.
sentences.sCn: 今年的销售额和去年相比不是很好。

trans.tranOther: next to or very close to the side of someone or something
